channel.title: 2007 like server with some newer features
channel.description:
My name is Ryan and I'm looking for help with developing a 2007 based server with some newer and custom items. I have implemented a lot so far such as... -Fletching -Smithing -Mining -Runecrafting -Woodcutting -Crafting -Firemaking -Farming -Herb -Agility -Thieving -Fishing -Cooking -Slayer -Great combat (range, melee, mage) -Prayer (fero (5) ring added)
-Pest control -Barrows -Fight pits -Tokkul minigame -Mage arena minigame -tzaar fight pits -63 waves of jad -Duel Arena -Daggs -KBD -Godwars -Chaos ele MUCH MORE!
A strong focus around the economy, players get dbones sell them for cash or use them for prayer. A membership system, with member only areas and member only items and perks. add my Skype
Skype=ryan.g874 if interested already have vps and everything set up.

item.title: 2007 like server with some newer features
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Items implanted into server
Slayer helm
Trident
Armadyl crossbow
Kraken whip
Dragon pickaxe

I’m currently a welder who works 60 hours a week and makes about 5 grand a month. I’m willing to put 1grand a month into the server. I really want to start something big. I’m open to new ideas but looking to form a serious team. All donations will be spread evenly. And if your looking for pay I’m all ears. I will take care of all the expensive things. I will buy banners on mopar rune locus and runes ever and other sites if you wish. I have a vps that is 8192mb ram. And if needed will improve. To 24678mb ram if server gets popular. I have 2grand to invest to start which will cover banners and everything else. I’m looking for a dedicated team who will make the next big server. I would like to keep it 07 based but I’m all ears for other ideas. We can speak over skype after 6:00 pm eastern time. Otherwise I can talk on my breaks from work. Only looking for serious applicants.

Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: 2007 like server with some newer features
